class.name: AbilitySystemEditorPlugin
class.brief_description: Editor integration for the Ability System.
class.description: [AbilitySystemEditorPlugin] provides custom inspectors and UI tools for managing gameplay tags and attributes within the Zyris Editor. Features include: - [b]Ability System Dashboard:[/b] A real-time debugging panel in the bottom dock. - [b]Visual Archetype Editor:[/b] A dedicated modal for configuring [AbilitySystemAbilityContainer] resources. - [b]Custom Property Editors:[/b] Searchable dropdowns for attributes and advanced search dialogs for tags.
